channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Timothy Busfield Surrenders to Police, Denies Child Sex Abuse Crimes in New Video: 'I'm Going to Fight It'
item.description: A warrant was issued on Jan. 9 for Busfield's arrest. He faces two counts of criminal sexual contact of a minor and one count of child abuse

item.title: Who Are “Dilbert” Creator Scott Adams' Ex-Wives? All About Shelly Miles and Kristina Basham
item.description: ‘Dilbert’ creator Scott Adams was married to Shelly Miles from 2006 to 2014, and later to Kristina Basham from 2020 to 2022

item.title: Michael B. Jordan Reveals How His Mom Feels About Nikki Glaser's Golden Globes Joke About Him
item.description: “She just gives a little eye roll and just kinda keeps it pushing,” joked the ‘Sinners’ actor of his mother Donna

item.title: Melissa Gilbert 'Stands with and Supports Her Husband' Timothy Busfield amid Child Sex Abuse Allegations: Rep
item.description: Busfield, 68, turned himself in to the Albuquerque Police Department on Jan. 13, PEOPLE confirmed

item.title: Inmate Who Called Rob and Michele Reiner ‘Family’ Says Kids Romy and Jake Reached Out After Their Deaths (Exclusive)
item.description: "They’re their parents' children. I know that they’re going through probably the toughest moment they’ll ever go through," Nanon Williams tells PEOPLE
